data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei.
Geeɠɔlɔgiti kpein ta GALA ná-lɛbiyai lɛɛzu,
Folo ɠilagi ɠa zɔɔma voloi ɠalasu ga naa,
Naa la ɠɛɛzu ga wooiti ɓaa kpɔɛzuɠulaiti,
Kɛlɛ ti-ma wooi ɠa laazeelizu eteai zu ná pɛ.
Kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ anzazini niinɛi, nii é ɠulazu daa ʋɛlɛi wu,
Ti vizɔgɛ zanugi ʋa, anɛɛ zanu mɔinmɔingiti,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa-lɔgiti ti ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui loa ɠisu,
Ɓɛ ɠa é tɔ ɓɔɠɔi ná-gaaɠilimalala vaaɠaazagi ɠwɛɛsu?
Nà ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui, màkɛ, gè mina gaaɠilima ɠoto ɠɛ!
